headline: Autodesk weighs takeover of engineering software firm PTC, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Autodesk's shares fell 2% in trading after the bell.  Autodesk has been working with advisers on a potential deal, the report said, adding that Boston-based PTC is also drawing interest from other industry players.  No final decision has been made and Autodesk could opt against pursuing a deal for PTC, according to the report.

headline: PTC stock soars as Autodesk weighs takeover bid
summary: Investing.com -- PTC Inc. (NASDAQ:PTC) stock soared 9% while Autodesk Inc . (NASDAQ:ADSK) shares fell 2% after Bloomberg reported that Autodesk is considering acquiring the rival engineering-software provider.

headline: Okta and 2 Other Software Stocks That Provide Shelter From Tariffs
summary: Okta, Autodesk, and CrowdStrike are the three software stocks that benefit the most from the new tax law, according to Morgan Stanley.
